name: Implausible Poetry
description: Built during Locomojam 2019 around the theme of "Lines", Implausible Poetry is a relaxation game where you can choose from many popular poems by famous authors, shuffle and re-arrange the lines to create new items of prose, and then have the game read the new poem back to you.  Accompanied by a soothing background music track that was also composed on the train during the game jam, the game aims to be accessible by offering a choice of typefaces and text size to make the text easier to read for people who may find it difficult to read.
